text: brrda phu thi meux phwk khea kratha sing chaw dı «hrux x yutithrrm kætaw xeng læw phwk khea k ra luk thung xallxh læw khxxphay thosʹ nı brrda khwam phid khxng phwk khea læa khır lea thi ca xphaythosʹ brrda khwam phid thanghlay hı di nxk ca kxallxh læw læa phwk khea midi dux ran ptibati nı sing thi khea khey ptibati ma doythi phwk khea ru kan xyu
